# Data Cleaning
- dropped car features, only used location data

```{r}
data_condensed <- read.csv("../results/clean_shot_data.csv") %>%
  select(c(goal, ball_pos_x, ball_pos_y, ball_pos_z,distanceToGoal,shot_taker_pos_x))

data_condensed %>%
  kable(format = "latex", row.names = NA, 
        booktabs = TRUE, digits = 2, 
        caption = "Subset of Location Features") %>%
  kable_styling(position = "center", latex_options = "HOLD_position")
```
